description: a(n) is the number of n X n matrices of 0's, 1's and -1's in which the entries in each row or column sum to 1.
crossrefs: Cf. A229165 (entries in each row or column sum to 1 and there are no adjacent -1's or 1's in any row or column).
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: Definition corrected by Murphy Waggoner and _R. H. Hardin_, Sep 24 2013
